info.name: Oreilly Learning - Clean Style
info.description: This style increases readability with subtle improvements on typography and layout. - info page of books - content page of books (can be used with different Modes like Day and Night) - book search page Support Me on Ko-fi <3
info.additionalInfo:
## 2001
- improved typography on book search page

## 1812
- updated for the new Oreilly version 
- improvements on content and info page of books

## 1801
- .night-mode class and tag
